title: Pollution casts a cloud over restaurants, but brings cheer to air purifier makers
description: The polluted air in Delhi-National Capital Region and, to some extent, Mumbai, is affecting dine-in sales at restaurants and bars during the peak festive season. Chains are reporting a decline of up to 30% compared to the previous year. Additionally, sales of masks and home/car air purifiers have surged by 70-100%, as stated by several executives.
